name: TVApplicationControllerContext
desc: Launch information provided to the TV application controller.

items.name: var javaScriptApplicationURL: URL
items.desc: URL pointing to the controlling JavaScript file for the application.

items.name: var launchOptions: [String : Any]
items.desc: Data passed to the JavaScript launch callback method.

items.name: var storageIdentifier: String?
items.desc: Optional identifier for a local storage file.

items.name: var supportsPictureInPicturePlayback: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether your app can display content in a picture-in-picture format.
